home.title: Master Your IELTS
home.subtitle: Practice with Confidence
home.description: Practice with realistic IELTS exams featuring auto-grading for Listening and Reading modules. Track your progress and improve your band score.
home.modulesSubtitle: Comprehensive practice for all four IELTS modules
home.listeningDesc: 4 sections, 40 questions. Auto-graded with instant feedback.
home.readingDesc: 3 passages, 40 questions. Split-screen view with auto-grading.
home.writingDesc: Task 1 & Task 2 with prompt saving. Expert feedback available.
home.speakingDesc: 3 parts with recording. Practice with mock interview questions.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your IELTS Journey?
home.ctaDesc: Join thousands of students improving their IELTS scores with our practice platform.

exams.title: Practice Exams
exams.subtitle: Select an exam to begin your practice
exams.noExamsDesc: Check back later for new practice tests or contact your administrator.

examSession.submitConfirm: Are you sure you want to submit your answers? This action cannot be undone.
examSession.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave? Your progress will be lost.

results.title: Exam Results
results.notFoundDesc: The exam results you are looking for could not be found.

dashboard.overviewText: Here's an overview of your IELTS preparation progress.
dashboard.emptyOverview: Start your first practice exam to see your progress here.
dashboard.noDataDesc: Complete your first exam to see score trends and module performance charts.
dashboard.noActivity: No activity yet. Start an exam to see your history here.
